table.name: questions
table.column: 1:mc:Which among the following syntax prints the output directly to the browser?:A. document.print:B. console.log:C. document.write():C

table.name: questions
table.column: 2:mc:It is a syntax that prints a value inside the console tab.:A. console.log:B. ("Hello World"):C. A document.write():A

table.name: questions
table.column: 3:mc:It is referred to a set of computer instructions in programming terminology.:A. Statements:B. Runtime:C. Binary:A

table.name: questions
table.column: 4:mc:Which of the following is the valid format to increment a variable.:A. +num:B. num++:C. num+:B
